name: TechLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light.”
”Alexa,set bedroom light to blue.”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
TechLife offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free. Just say it, TechLife will obey. 

Here's a step by step guide:
A. Download our "TechLife" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
B. Launch the app and register a new account(or login if you're already registered);
C. Turn on TechLife devices and connect them with "TechLife" app;
D. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
E. Search the Alexa Skills directory for "TechLife";
F. Click Enable skill of "TechLife", then input your account username, password on the linking page;
G. Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands "TechLife" has:

Lights:
* Alexa, turn on all lights.
* Alexa, turn off all lights.
* Alexa, turn on bedroom light.
* Alexa, turn off bedroom light.
* Alexa, decrease bedroom light.
* Alexa, increase bedroom light.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to 20 percent.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to 100 percent.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to red.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to blue.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to white.

Help and support:
If you have any problems, please contact us at service@techlifecloud.com or call the customer service number (+86)0755-84553499, and we will have professional staffs to answer.
